name: Tree of Life from Nusantara
description:
Trees are a testament of time, giving protection and nourishment for many creatures in nature, including humans. Let us be thankful for nature & come together to preserve it.

This tree of life has a few flowers on it: the fragrant Melati (jasmine) at the top, Anggrek Bulan (moon orchid) & Kemboja (plumeria/frangipani). At the bottom is one of the largest known flower, as well as a national flower of Indonesia, the Rafflesia Arnoldi or monster flower. It also surrounded by a few Indonesian birds from across the Nusantara (achipelago): Garuda (eagle), Cendrawasih (bird of paradise), Kasuari (cassowary) and the all black Cemani chicken. It is drawn in the style of batik from Central Java.

The song used in the video is called Ladrang Pucung, performed by the gamelan group Puspo Budoyo and used with their permission.

The lyrics:
Sekar pucung dadi tombo ati bingung.
Panglipure roso murih yuwono basuki.
Suko syukur awit kersane bathoro.

Translation:
This song is a balm for troubled souls.
Dispersing that feeling to be healthy and safe.
Thankful because of the almighty.
